snippet: Anna Fenninger of Austria seized the lead in the overall Alpine World Cup standings by winning a giant slalom in Are, Sweden, for the second straight day.
abstract: Anna Fenninger of Austria wins giant slalom event in Are, Sweden, seizing the lead in the overall Alpine World Cup standings; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Anna Fenninger of Austria seized the lead in the overall Alpine World Cup standings by winning a giant slalom in Are, Sweden, for the second straight day.
